title: Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi starrer 'Vikram Veda' movie poster out- The New Indian Express
text:
Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi starrer 'Vikram Veda' movie poster out By Online Desk | Published: 22nd February 2017 03:24 PM | Last Updated: 22nd February 2017 03:24 PM | A+ A A- | 0 Share Via Email Vikram Veda movie poster.(Twitter via @ActorMadhavan) 
The online release of Vikram Veda , the upcoming Tamil crime-thriller, has awed the fans of Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi. 
The movie has been directed by the Pushkar and Gayathri duo, featuring R Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi in the lead roles. Shraddha Srinath, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, Kathir and John Vijay play supporting roles in the movie. 
R Madhavan will play the role of the an encounter specialist with Vijay Sethupathi as his nemesis. 
Though the storyline will be typically about a cop in pursuit of the villain, the director has added a new flavour to the storyline inspired by the folk tale - Vikramathithan Vedhalam. 
The crew officially began production in Novemeber 2016 and the shooting was wrapped up earlier in January. The post production work is now underway. @VikramVedhaFilm First look poster folks. I am so excited. pic.twitter.com/2Zd8unhIfK â€” Ranganathan Madhavan (@ActorMadhavan) February 22, 2017
